choiceresponse.label: Communication activity has many potential dimensions, including

checkboxgroup.choice: Internal (within the project) and external (customer, other projects, the media, the public),
Formal (reports, memos, briefings) and informal (emails, ad-hoc discussions),
Vertical (up and down the organization) and horizontal (with peers),
Official (newsletters, annual report) and unofficial (off the record communications),
Written and oral, and Verbal and non-verbal (voice inflections, body language)
